lines.text: [Flint has found Henry in the graveyard]
I bet if we dug up these graves, we'd find a dead body in every one!
Well, so would I!
[Flint has realised that Henry is innocent of all charges]

In that case, *I* am under arrest. I am hereby arresting myself, for conspiring to falsify evidence for the wrongful arrest of a private citizen, misuse of police manpower and resources, and for knowingly obtaining an unlicensed firearm from an illegal source, with intent to murder and maim.
[Hands shotgun to Eva]
I am not obliged to say anything, but anything I do say can be noted and used as evidence. If someone would care to call the police, I shall be in the cemetery.
[Flint exits, while Henry joins Eva]
He's been under a lot of stress, lately.
[Henry bursts into the church, to find the vicar trying to strangle Eva]
Now you listen here, if anyone's going to murder my wife, it's going to be me!
Your wife! Your wife is *dead*!
You know what, Inspector, for the first time since I met you, you're in danger of actually being right about something!
[Henry wacks Flint into an open grave with the shovel, and runs off]
[Henry has arrived at the church, looking for Eva]
Why didn't I sign my own name? I'd be safely locked up in Broadmoor by now!
[Henry is looking through the kitchen cupboards]

[looking at the dog]
Where does she keep the Marmite, Dasher?
Don't tell the bastards nothing!
*Anything*, Cranham! Don't tell the bastards *anything*!

[Indicating the students]
They look like football hooligans!
They *are* football hooligans!

[Wilt has just told him what happened to Eva's note]
Do you mean to say that the one piece of evidence that could corroborate your story is wrapped round a turd headed for the North Sea?
Yes.
How tragically inconvenient!

[to Wilt, who has just attacked him thinking he is a mugger]
I *am* the fucking police, you gormless erection!

[to Eva, referring to Sally]
She just wanted to get into your knickers!

[indignantly]
Are you calling Sal a lesbian?
I don't have to! She's already got their number!
[He and sally burst out laughing]

[to a policewoman]
Do you think they'll want to do a cast of my face for the Chamber of Horrors?

[face to face with Inspector Flint in the cemetery]
You cretinous testicle!
You're inferring we're
[meaning the police]
all thick!
No, I'm *implying* you're all thick, *you're* inferring that that is what I'm *implying*.
So what am I supposed to have done with the body, then?
[sarcastic]
Dissolved it in a huge vat of acid?
Aha!
Oh, come on! Do you know how much acid that would take?
Why don't you tell me?
No, anybody who'd believe that theory can't have his head screwed on straight!
[Dr Pittman has a noticeable crick in his neck]

[reads from the Bible on the lectern]
"Beauty in a woman without good judgement is like a gold ring in the snout of a swine."
